title: Unlocking Dev Super powers with SvelteKit
description: SvelteKit gives developers the ability to do more with less. Less code, less energy, and consequently less time. More so, it gives you all the SEO benefits of single-page applications with client-side routing for almost instant navigation. Talk about the best of both worlds. With the techniques we'll discuss in this talk, you'll learn how to get the best of SvelteKit and unlock the superpowers you never knew you had
